import * as Yup from "yup"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Login() { const initialValues = { username: "", email: "", password: "", }; const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ username: Yup.string().required("Username is required"), email: Yup.string().email("Invalid email").required("Email is required"), password: Yup.string().required("Password is required"), }); return (
